text: Jack Hearn Watson Jr. (born October 24, 1938) is an American political strategist and political aide. He was White House Chief of Staff to President Jimmy Carter from 1980 to 1981. ==Other websites== *Biography from a University of Miami website * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:White House Chiefs of Staff Category:Politicians from El Paso, Texas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Jack Watson (presidential adviser)
